import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Workarea.css' import DeleteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Delete'; import { IconButton } from '@mui/material'; import PersonIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Person'; import SendOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/SendOutlined'; import Messageother from '../messagecomponet/Messageother'; import Messageself from '../messagecomponet/Messageself'; import axios from 'axios'; import { MyContext } from '../contextapi/CreateContext'; function Workarea() { const [conversation, setconversation] = useState( { name: 'manu', lastmessage: 'last message 1', timespan: 'today' } ) return (

{conversation.name}

{conversation.timespan}

) } export default Workarea
